General.Name: Sichuan Swellfun Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Swellfun Co.,Ltd produces and sells liquor and wine. It offers products, such as  shuijingfang yuan, ming and qing dynasties, shuijingfang jingcui, shuijingfang collection, shuijingfang zhenniang no. 8, shuijingfang jingtai collection, shuijingfang hongyun, shuijingfang plum orchid, bamboo and chrysanthemum, xiaoshuijing, tianhao chen, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Chengdu, China.
